title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the slope of tangent line

1 point is earned for the answer

P'(0) = 1 - 3 = -2. The lake will become safe when the amount decreases by 10. A linear model predicts this will happen when t = 5.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the slope of tangent line

1 point is earned for the answer

P'(0) = 1 - 3 = -2. The lake will become safe when the amount decreases by 10. A linear model predicts this will happen when t = 5.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the slope of tangent line

1 point is earned for the answer

P'(0) = 1 - 3 = -2. The lake will become safe when the amount decreases by 10. A linear model predicts this will happen when t = 5.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the slope of tangent line

1 point is earned for the answer

P'(0) = 1 - 3 = -2. The lake will become safe when the amount decreases by 10. A linear model predicts this will happen when t = 5.
